channel.title: music on irc.watch
channel.description: Recent content in music on irc.watch

item.title: anji - FUCK BINGIT
item.description: i go by bengt, beloved efnet chatter. who the fuck is bingit? i don’t think it matters. what a fuckin weirdo,- 6 letter nick ? call me a man? u can suck this fuckin dick 5 letter gang, get ur fuckin shit straight our aestethic alphabetic, you don’t get it? that’s pathetic it’s cosmetic. but what would you know? i’m sure you’re on mirc with how much your chats blow

item.title: darkmage - zbeefer
item.description: Yo, I’m coming around with the sick flow But you don’t even know bout the code I already wrote A long time ago, when I was stoned In my damn home, now you think you know But you don’t even got a fucking clue Pics or it didn’t happen? On your head a damn shoe You looking mad foolish, Zack, that’s the damn truth You know the feds are watching, they coming after you

item.title: eraser - 44birds
item.description: crack open laptop, crackhead at the crack spot addicted to the chatting, walked away, but i can’t stop turn it round like a door knob, eat it up like a fat slob like me on IRC when that new vap0r track dropped click clackin the keyboard, cut you down like a long sword this nick say she a chick, n she thick, but i’m not sure still chat cause i’m that bored, sends me pics, but i’m not lured,

item.title: eraser - i only got 15 minutes
item.description: i only got 15 minutes this contest almost a grand i hope i win it anji said it, so now me, fuck bingit i’m writing this in notepad right now, i wing it pick a booger out the nose, i fling it got a cock, call me bumble, i’ll sting it turn the page, differe word to rhyme darkmage’s raps surprisingly on time ripped l0de’s heart out, n bird beaked his spine

item.title: jewbird - fakest nigga on efnet
item.description: jewbird king of the radio hours - check the chat crown and I hate to kick a gypsy when he’s down, but why is it gypsy man claims he’s untrollable, when infact his mind is quite controllable, jewbirds chats and fame are insoluble rising up beyond ranks no one thought was probable fuck your disrespect and shit talking - talons put you in your place your lack of ingenuity is a disgrace

item.title: spoke - retarded
item.description: Took a little sniff now im bout to blitz 5letter clique we run this bitch Got tunes got bars got scripts were talented as shit Who knew sq could be so cute hard to believe she was ever a dude Friday on jrh jewbirdâ€™s mental unix slays Bumping yung innanet windows down no regrets Fuckhole jones in the place to be And im feelin mighty proud of my family

item.title: spoke - run it
item.description: Is you smoking Is you drinking Is you online data leaking what the fuck you think You sound like a cop the way you questioning me Runnin it i stay runnin it If you buying with the bits betta tumble it Onion it Dont fumble it one false move could be humblin Hustling only buying on a dip Sell on every crest Catch a bubble while its fresh Running it

item.title: xartet - what a chatter know
item.description: yo a chatter know the game what a chatter name, kid? X like the flick, slick what a chatter clique be? EFnet, the salt gang what a chatter do? 10k lines a day, mane gotta couple shells of which i chat through OVH the host but it must be MESA crew that’s clogging up the pipe and messin with my flow bp38? ya boy eraser don’t know sittin here like “where my pals at?
